name: iOS 14.4 and iPadOS 14.4
available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: A remote attacker may be able to cause a denial of service
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

cves.credit: Cees Elzinga

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: A local user may be able to read arbitrary files
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved permissions logic.

cves.credit: Thomas Tempelmann

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: A remote attacker may be able to cause arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved input validation.
